description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Sciener server does not validate connection requests from the GatewayG2, allowing an impersonation attack that provides the attacker the unlockKey field.
El servidor Sciener no valida las solicitudes de conexión de GatewayG2, lo que permite un ataque de suplantación de identidad que proporciona al atacante el campo unlockKey.
